filmography.title: New Frontier
filmography.role_description: A young pioneer woman in her first screen role (credited as Phylis Isley), starring alongside John Wayne.
filmography.plot: The Three Mesquiteers help a group of settlers who have been swindled out of their land by a corrupt politician building a dam.

filmography.title: Dick Tracy's G-Men
filmography.role_description: The female lead in this serial adventure (credited as Phylis Isley), aiding the famous detective against a spy ring.
filmography.plot: Dick Tracy battles the international spy Zarnoff, who has returned from the dead to sabotage America's defense efforts.

filmography.title: The Song of Bernadette
filmography.role_description: A humble French peasant girl who experiences visions of the Virgin Mary at Lourdes, facing skepticism and persecution with unwavering faith.
filmography.plot: In 1858 France, a peasant girl's vision of a 'beautiful lady' brings controversy and eventually healing to her town.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Actress; Golden Globe: Win – Best Actress (Drama)

filmography.title: Since You Went Away
filmography.role_description: The eldest daughter in a family struggling on the American home front during WWII, who matures through love and tragic loss.
filmography.plot: A mother and her two daughters navigate life, love, and sacrifice while the father is away fighting in World War II.

filmography.title: Love Letters
filmography.role_description: A woman suffering from amnesia who falls in love with a soldier, unaware that he wrote the love letters she cherishes from her deceased husband.
filmography.plot: A soldier writes love letters for a friend, but when he meets the recipient years later, she has amnesia and is accused of murder.

filmography.title: Cluny Brown
filmography.role_description: A plumber's niece with a penchant for plumbing who shakes up a stuffy English country estate.
filmography.plot: A free-spirited girl is sent to work as a maid in a country manor, where she falls for a charming Czech refugee.

filmography.title: Duel in the Sun
filmography.role_description: A passionate, half-Native American woman caught in a destructive love triangle between two brothers.
filmography.plot: A beautiful woman causes a rift between two brothers on a Texas ranch, leading to a violent and tragic conclusion.

filmography.title: Portrait of Jennie
filmography.role_description: A mysterious, ethereal young woman who inspires a struggling painter, aging years every time they meet.
filmography.plot: A struggling artist meets a strange girl in Central Park who seems to be from another time and grows up with each encounter.

filmography.title: We Were Strangers
filmography.role_description: A Cuban woman who joins a revolutionary group to avenge her brother's death, plotting to assassinate a corrupt official.
filmography.plot: In 1930s Cuba, revolutionaries dig a tunnel under a cemetery to assassinate a high-ranking government official.

filmography.title: Madame Bovary
filmography.role_description: The bored, romantic wife of a country doctor who destroys her life through illicit affairs and lavish spending.
filmography.plot: A beautiful woman, bored with her marriage to a country doctor, engages in adulterous affairs and runs up debts to escape her mundane life.

filmography.title: Gone to Earth
filmography.role_description: A superstitious, nature-loving girl in the English countryside who is torn between a gentle minister and a cruel squire.
filmography.plot: A gypsy girl in Shropshire loves her pet fox and nature, but her life is disrupted by the attentions of two very different men.

filmography.title: The Wild Heart
filmography.role_description: The re-edited US version of 'Gone to Earth', featuring new scenes and narration that alter the tone of the original story.
filmography.plot: A re-cut version of 'Gone to Earth' with added scenes and voiceovers, focusing on the tragic romance of a nature girl.

filmography.title: Carrie
filmography.role_description: A naive country girl who moves to Chicago and becomes involved with a salesman and a married restaurant manager, leading to his ruin.
filmography.plot: A young woman moves to the city and rises to fame as an actress while the married man who gave up everything for her descends into poverty.

filmography.title: Ruby Gentry
filmography.role_description: A fiery Southern girl from the 'wrong side of the tracks' who seeks revenge on the town's elite after being spurned by her lover.
filmography.plot: A poor girl marries a wealthy man for security but wreaks havoc on the town and her former lover after her husband's death.

filmography.title: Indiscretion of an American Wife
filmography.role_description: A married American woman who attempts to break off her affair with an Italian academic during a tense meeting at Rome's train station.
filmography.plot: An American housewife tries to end her affair with an Italian man, but their final goodbye at the terminal is fraught with emotion and police interference.

filmography.title: Beat the Devil
filmography.role_description: A compulsive liar and imaginative British woman who gets mixed up with a group of eccentric crooks in Italy.
filmography.plot: A quartet of international crooks are stranded in Italy while their steamer is being repaired, engaging in various schemes with a curious couple.

filmography.title: Love Is a Many-Splendored Thing
filmography.role_description: A dedicated Eurasian doctor in Hong Kong who falls in love with a married American war correspondent.
filmography.plot: A widowed doctor of both Chinese and European descent falls in love with a married American correspondent in Hong Kong during China's Civil War.

filmography.title: Good Morning, Miss Dove
filmography.role_description: A strict but beloved small-town schoolteacher who reflects on her life and the students she has influenced while hospitalized.
filmography.plot: A terrible pain forces a dedicated teacher to be hospitalized, where she is visited by former students who remember her impact on their lives.

filmography.title: The Man in the Gray Flannel Suit
filmography.role_description: The ambitious wife of a WWII veteran, who pushes him to seek a higher-paying corporate job to support their lifestyle.
filmography.plot: An ex-soldier faces ethical questions as he tries to earn enough to support his wife and children in the corporate world.

filmography.title: The Barretts of Wimpole Street
filmography.role_description: The invalid poet who finds the courage to defy her tyrannical father and elope with fellow poet Robert Browning.
filmography.plot: The poet Elizabeth Barrett suffers under the rule of her domineering father until she falls in love with Robert Browning.

filmography.title: A Farewell to Arms
filmography.role_description: A British Red Cross nurse in WWI Italy who engages in a tragic romance with an American ambulance driver.
filmography.plot: An American ambulance driver and an English nurse fall in love in Italy during World War I, but war tears them apart.

filmography.title: Tender Is the Night
filmography.role_description: A wealthy, mentally unstable woman whose marriage to her psychiatrist slowly disintegrates on the French Riviera.
filmography.plot: A psychiatrist marries his wealthy patient, but their life on the French Riviera destroys his career and their marriage.

filmography.title: The Idol
filmography.role_description: A mother who becomes involved in a destructive affair with her son's best friend in Swinging London.
filmography.plot: A rebellious art student befriends a medical student but seduces his mother, leading to tragic consequences.

filmography.title: Angel, Angel, Down We Go
filmography.role_description: A wealthy, neurotic mother who gets drawn into a bizarre cult-like relationship with a rock singer.
filmography.plot: A troubled debutante introduces her family to a charismatic rock star who seduces and destroys them one by one.
filmography.awards: Cult Classic (aka Cult of the Damned)

filmography.title: The Towering Inferno
filmography.role_description: A wealthy widow and resident of the doomed skyscraper who finds a connection with a con man before disaster strikes; Jones' final film role.
filmography.plot: At the opening party of a colossal office building, a massive fire breaks out, trapping the guests on the top floor.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Supporting Actress
